solution_line_template: On Friday the restaurant had {breakfast_customers} customers for breakfast + {lunch_customers} customers for lunch + {dinner_customers} customers for dinner = <<{breakfast_customers}+{lunch_customers}+{dinner_customers}={total_customers_friday}>>{total_customers_friday} customers total on Friday.

If they predict getting {multiplier_saturday}x the amount of customers on Saturday as on Friday, they will have {total_customers_friday} customers x {multiplier_saturday} = <<{total_customers_friday}*{multiplier_saturday}={predicted_customers_saturday}>>{predicted_customers_saturday} customers on Saturday.
